participant_1.background:

i have a collection of video games.
I spend most of my time working, but I make time for my friends and family when I can.
i try to do my job as best as i can.

I picked up my guitar and started playing.
I'm well connected in the entertainment industry.

content.text: Hello there! I'm trying to find some new books to read. Do you have any recommendations?
I have a few! I love mermaid books, do you have any favorite authors?
I've been reading some books by Axie Oh lately, and I really like her books!
I've never heard of Axie Oh, but I'll have to check them out! What's your favorite book by her?
I really liked The Girl Who Fell Beneath the Sea. It's a retelling of The Little Mermaid, but with a darker twist.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out. Do you like any other genres of books?
I like reading a variety of books, but I'm also a big fan of video games.
I love video games too! What are some of your favorites?
I'm really into The Legend of Zelda games right now. I'm also a big fan of the Mario games.
Those are great games! I've been playing a lot of Mario Kart lately.
I love Mario Kart! It's so much fun to play with friends.
It is! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
